subject: Football
Concussions
Brain
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: When Dave Duerson committed suicide, he shot himself in the chest rather than the head, so his brain could be examined for a degenerative disease caused by repetitive brain trauma.
snippet: When Dave Duerson committed suicide, he shot himself in the chest rather than the head, so his brain could be examined for a degenerative disease caused by repetitive brain trauma.
